TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EntityEntryGraphNode`1<TState> extends Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.EntityEntryGraphNode
Public Class EntityEntryGraphNode(Of TState) Inherits EntityEntryGraphNode

Docs.summary: Provides access to change tracking information and operations for a node in a graph of entities that is being traversed.
Docs.remarks: See Tracking entities in EF Core for more information.
